mapper.select: select * from v_trmemployeeretion t1 where trmemployeeretionid=#{id}
select * from v_trmemployeeretion t1 where trmemployeeretionid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BMJZRQ`, t1.`BMKSSJ`, t1.`BMTJ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t11.`KCXS`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`PXDD`, t31.`PXHDBM`, t1.`PXNR`, t11.`SKJSSJ`, t11.`SKKSRQ`, t1.`TRMCOUARRANGEID`, t11.`TRMCOUARRANGENAME`, t1.`TRMEMPLOYEERETIONID`, t1.`TRMEMPLOYEERETIONNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID`, t31.`TRMTRAINACTAPPLYNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINAGENCYID`, t41.`TRMTRAINAGENCYNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_TRMEMPLOYEERETION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMCOUARRANGE t11 ON t1.TRMCOUARRANGEID = t11.TRMCOUARRANGEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINACTAPPLY t31 ON t1.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID = t31.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINAGENCY t41 ON t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID = t41.TRMTRAINAGENCYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BMJZRQ, t1.BMKSSJ, t1.BMTJ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t11.KCXS, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.PXDD, t31.PXHDBM, t1.PXNR, t11.SKJSSJ, t11.SKKSRQ, t1.TRMCOUARRANGEID, t11.TRMCOUARRANGENAME, t1.TRMEMPLOYEERETIONID, t1.TRMEMPLOYEERETIONNAME, t1.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID, t31.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYNAME, t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID, t41.TRMTRAINAGENCYNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_TRMEMPLOYEERETION t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMCOUARRANGE t11 ON t1.TRMCOUARRANGEID = t11.TRMCOUARRANGEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINACTAPPLY t31 ON t1.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID = t31.TRMTRAINACTAPPLYID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINAGENCY t41 ON t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID = t41.TRMTRAINAGENCYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
